name: DeleteTeam
description:
Delete a team from your Vercel account.

Use this tool to send a request to delete a specific team under your Vercel account by providing the team ID. Optional reasons for deletion can be included.

parameters.name: team_identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the team to be deleted in your Vercel account.

value_schema.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: deletion_reasons
parameters.description: Optional array of objects detailing reasons for team deletion, each with a 'slug' and 'description'.

slug.description: Idenitifier slug of the reason why the team is being deleted.

description.description: Description of the reason why the team is being deleted.

reasons.description: Optional array of objects that describe the reason why the team is being deleted.

parameters.name: new_default_team_id
parameters.description: Specify the team ID to set as the new default after deletion.

value_schema.description: Id of the team to be set as the new default team

parameters.name: team_slug
parameters.description: The slug of the team you want to delete. Used to identify the team for the delete operation.

value_schema.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the vercel API.

parameters.name: newDefaultTeamId
parameters.description: Id of the team to be set as the new default team

value_schema.description: Id of the team to be set as the new default team

parameters.name: slug
parameters.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of.

value_schema.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: teamId
parameters.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

value_schema.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

slug.description: Idenitifier slug of the reason why the team is being deleted.

description.description: Description of the reason why the team is being deleted.

reasons.description: Optional array of objects that describe the reason why the team is being deleted.
